超級好玩啊！！！！！！！！目前玩到的雙人遊戲裡最好玩的沒有之一，我跟朋友都一直在等出第３版啊！！！！！！！！貴一點我也願意原價買的遊戲！！！！！！

想要找朋友一起玩的話，這款真的非常推薦！

有點解謎要素，三ｄ特效，非常有品質，而且這是唯一一種傳送門遊戲啊！幾乎沒見過其他相同性質的遊戲！非常值得試試！

如果是單人，推薦玩第一代～

One of the best games I've ever played, whether you're into puzzle games or not, this is an incredible game to play regardless. Great story, great levels, satisfying ending, and still leaves you wanting more. The custom puzzles created by the community are a great way to keep playing, even after you're done the main story. Easy 10/10, would play over and over again.

Good Game. Spectacular Game. I play this game for no other reason than smoking Grant. What do you expect? The guy SUCKS at the game. 1:37 on level 4 of the mass and gravity challenge co-op levels? is that some sort of sick joke? The guys a bozo, literal clod. We fly through the levels smoking grant at every possible opportunity sometimes even halving his pathetic joke of a time. This game is for simple minded buffoons such as Grant himself. "But Jamal!" i hear you say and to you I say I already know what you are going to say "Did you not say this game was a Good Game. Spectacular Game" this was directed for simple minded small guys like Grant, if you were not a simple minded little greedy thieving man like Grant you would know this already, check yourself before you wreck yourself.
